taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have already generated documentation of required models and that you have your document opened.
taskbody.context: These steps apply only to Microsoft Office Excel 2003.

step.cmd: Click in the Excel cell where you want the HTML file to be inserted.
On the menu bar, select Data Import External Data Import Data .
step.stepresult: The Select Data Source dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Browse and select the desired HTML file to insert, then click Open.
step.stepresult: The New Web Query dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Select the part of the HTML document to insert, then click Import.
step.stepresult: The Import Data dialog box is displayed.

taskbody.result: The HTML file content is inserted into the document.
taskbody.postreq: It is recommended that you apply changes to the formatting according to your document and check that a refresh does not override these changes.
